avatax.address_validation_instructions_with_cho: To ensure accurate delivery, we suggest the changes highlighted below. Please choose which address you would like to use. If neither option is correct, edit your address
avatax.address_validation_instructions_without_: To ensure accurate delivery, we've made the changes highlighted below. If this address is not correct, edit your address.
avatax.address_validation_error_instruction: We were unable to validate your address. If the address below is correct then you donâ€™t need to do anything else please change your address.

address_templates.oneline: {{depend prefix}}{{var prefix}} {{/depend}}{{var firstname}} {{depend middlename}}{{var middlename}} {{/depend}}{{var lastname}}{{depend suffix}} {{var suffix}}{{/depend}}, {{var street}}, {{var city}}, {{depend county}}{{var county}} ,{{/depend}} {{var region}} {{var postcode}}, {{var country}}
